abstract: So Yeon Ryu shoots tournament-record nine-under-par to take first-round lead in Swinging Skirts LPGA Classic in Daly City, Calif; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: So Yeon Ryu shot a tournament-record nine-under-par 63 to take the first-round lead in the Swinging Skirts L.P.G.A. Classic.
snippet: So Yeon Ryu shot a tournament-record nine-under-par 63 to take the first-round lead in the Swinging Skirts L.P.G.A. Classic....
